sql.query:
SELECT m_product.id, m_product.market_id, m_product.rest_id, m_product.category_id, m_product.brand_id, m_product.slab_id, m_product.prod_mark_id, m_product.prod_occurance_id, m_product.prod_name_en, m_product.prod_name_bn, m_product.prod_name_hin, m_product.prod_desc_en, m_product.prod_desc_bn, m_product.prod_desc_hin, price.id AS price_id, price.quantity, price.q_unit, price.mrp, price.selling_price, price.product_tax, price.purchase_price
FROM m_product
LEFT JOIN r_price_table AS price ON (price.prod_id = m_product.id)
WHERE m_product.prod_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.product_id}} */ AND m_product.status = 1 AND price.id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.price}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountProd
FROM r_cart
WHERE prod_id = :P1 /* {{GetProduct.id}} */ AND (user_id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */ OR ip_address = :P3 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */)

SELECT COUNT(r_cart.id) AS CountRest
FROM r_cart
INNER JOIN m_product AS mp ON (mp.id = r_cart.prod_id)
WHERE r_cart.user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND mp.rest_id <> :P2 /* {{GetProduct.rest_id}} */ AND mp.deleted_on IS NULL AND mp.status = 1

INSERT INTO r_cart
(prod_id, price_id, user_id, prod_unit_price, prod_qty, total_price, created_by, created_on, ip_address, cart_mrp, cart_purchase) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetProduct.id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetProduct.price_id}} */, :P3 /* {{identity}} */, :P4 /* {{GetProduct.selling_price}} */, :P5 /* {{1}} */, :P6 /* {{GetProduct.selling_price}} */, :P7 /* {{identity?identity:''}} */, :P8 /* {{NOW}} */, :P9 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P10 /* {{GetProduct.mrp}} */, :P11 /* {{GetProduct.purchase_price}} */)

DELETE
FROM r_wishlist
WHERE prod_id = :P1 /* {{GetProduct.id}} */ AND (user_id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */ OR ips = :P3 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */)

SELECT r_cart.id, r_cart.prod_id, r_cart.price_id, r_cart.user_id, r_cart.prod_unit_price, r_cart.prod_qty, r_cart.total_price, r_cart.cart_mrp, r_cart.cart_purchase
FROM r_cart
INNER JOIN m_product AS mp ON (mp.id = r_cart.prod_id)
WHERE r_cart.user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND mp.rest_id <> :P2 /* {{GetProduct.rest_id}} */ AND mp.status = 1 AND mp.deleted_on IS NULL

INSERT INTO r_wishlist
(prod_id, price_id, user_id, prod_unit_price, prod_qty, total_price, ips, created_by, created_on, wishlist_mrp) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].price_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].user_id}} */, :P4 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_unit_price}} */, :P5 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_qty}} */, :P6 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].total_price}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{identity}} */, :P9 /* {{NOW}} */, :P10 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].cart_mrp}} */)

DELETE
FROM r_cart
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].id}} */

INSERT INTO r_cart
(prod_id, price_id, user_id, prod_unit_price, prod_qty, total_price, created_by, created_on, ip_address, cart_mrp, cart_purchase) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetProduct.id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetProduct.price_id}} */, :P3 /* {{identity}} */, :P4 /* {{GetProduct.selling_price}} */, :P5 /* {{1}} */, :P6 /* {{GetProduct.selling_price}} */, :P7 /* {{identity?identity:''}} */, :P8 /* {{NOW}} */, :P9 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P10 /* {{GetProduct.mrp}} */, :P11 /* {{GetProduct.purchase_price}} */)

DELETE
FROM r_wishlist
WHERE prod_id = :P1 /* {{GetProduct.id}} */ AND (user_id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */ OR ips = :P3 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */)

DELETE
FROM r_wishlist
WHERE prod_id = :P1 /* {{GetProduct.id}} */ AND ips = :P2 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */
